channel.title: [Request] Photoshop image
channel.description:
I need someone to make me like an emblem/title for like a simple band cover.
Our names are the "the Kiwis" which are little fluffy penguins in New Zealand or the green harry fruit.
So can anyone make me like a title saying "The Kiwis" with to Kiwis next to each other?
Heres our first cover lul: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=VPjzEcqnTEY

item.title: [Request] Photoshop image
item.dc:creator: @reyx7 reyx7
item.description:
@reyx7 wrote:

[quote=“the elve age, post:7, topic:411501”][quote author=reyx7 link=topic=512757.msg3721711#msg3721711 date=1313978097]
I wouldn’t recommend posting this. You’ll probably get trolled.

http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,501080.0.html <–relevant
[/quote]
I believe its done before, for a mod. And this isn’t MITB.[/quote]
I’ve seen it here, too. Im just to lazy to search.

Read full topic
